transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Yes.

Executive: Hello. Haan mai Pradeep Odisha se bol raha hu.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Haanji sir boliye.

Customer: Haan, Avni ji bol rahe hain?

Executive: Haan, mai Avni bol rahi hu, boliye.

Customer: Haan, dekhiye abhi to jaise ki halat hai maine bahut isko saaf kiya tha maine kal bhi kiya tha aaj bhi kar raha hu mai. 

Customer: Isme koi result vagera kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai. 

Customer: To maine mail kar diya hai mujhe abhi ye aisa to mujhe vapas chahiye apna jo refund chahiye wo jitne bhi maine diye the.

Executive: Aapne kaha mail kiya hai mere paas to koi mail nahi aaya.

Customer: To dekhiye jo customer care@gmail.com.

Executive: Aapka kab shuru hua hai abhi 3 October, 2 October ko to shuru hua hai.

Customer: Haan, 3 sir aapka ek mahina ka jo jitna banta hai wo aap rakh lijiye.

Customer: To problem kya aa rahi hai?

Customer: Kuch business nahi aa raha hai jisko mai bol raha hu maine AC dal diya tha mujhe dealer ko chahiye mai khud mai khud seller hu.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Jisko bhi mai call kar raha hu jitne mujhe pehle bhi maine jisko number note down karke sir rakha tha unko dobara call karta hu to wo bol rahe hain ki chota se lekar bada amount tak sab sab bol rahe hain ki nahi nahi ye humne AC dal diya tha hum dekh lete hain kya hai.

Executive: Sab to nahi bol sakte sir.

Customer: Ji?

Executive: Sab to nahi bol sakte.

Customer: Haan wo to aise bol rahe hain mai kya karu.

Executive: Mai keh rahi hu sab to nahi bol sakte kuch bol rahe honge kuch to kuch ko to requirement bhi hogi.

Customer: Haan aur kuch bol rahe hain aap whatsapp pe dijiye hum dekh lenge humko whatsapp kar rahe hain aapne wo wale kyu convert nahi ho pa rahe hain?

Customer: Haan wo to nahi ho rahe ki humne yaha se le liya aur ek baat jo pan India hota hai na wo bol rahe hain ki aisa hai kal ek ne mujhe bola ki inka dung wala hamare yaha chal raha hai man lijiye 7 rupay aap 8 rupay 8 rupay to aap waha se aap se waha se aap se waha se lenge to hamara jo hota hai private transport wo aapko lena padega wo humse kyu lenge humne Pune se mangwa liya.

Customer: To ye jo issue ho raha hai ki itne dur se jo ye sab to hota hi hai wo to har kisi ke sath thodi hoga aapka aisa ek aad kisi ke sath ye wali cheez ho bhi gayi to isme kya ho gaya matlab wo to aisa to apne aap normally hota hi hoga wo to aapko matlab convert karne ka hai thoda active jyada rahoge to convert ho jayegi ki wo kisi aur se baat na kar paye usse pehle aap usse baat kar lo aap us tak pahunch jao.

Customer: Nahi nahi bahut bahut koshish kar liya bahut sab bol rahe hain ek hi baat humne le liya humne inse aise just dal diya tha inquiry aur jisko sir aap use bhi to kam kar rahe ho na aapne 30 din mein 6 din hi use kiya hai by lead.

Customer: To use bhi to kam kiya hai aapne by lead wo bhi to dekhiye aapne isko mai sab bol rahe hain ki hum buyer hain hum seller hain.

Executive: Sir haan ek baat bataiye aapne is mahine char din mein saat lead li hai aaj 27 din ho gaye hain is mahine ke November ke. 

Executive: Theek hai to pichle mahine aapne 13 din mein 53 lead li thi. 

Executive: Theek hai haan ab un 53 ke 53 logo ko aapne call kiya hoga sabne to utha nahi liya hoga bahut se to aise honge jinhone to kabhi bhi nahi kiya hoga. 

Executive: 53 mein se man lo 20 hai 20 mein se aapne agar ek aad se pehla mahina tha aapka to aisa ho sakta hai matlab jaruri nahi hai ki aapki deal convert ho hi jaye lekin aapko buyers mile hain jinhe requirement thi jinki kahin aur deal ho gayi wo ek alag baat hai.

Executive: Theek hai aur is mahine to aapne use hi nahi kiya hai jyada char din mein saat lead li hai matlab aapne saat logo ko by lead pe call kiya hai ab saat mein se aapki deal kaise convert hogi?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Executive: Wait kar diya kya sir? Hello?

Customer: Hello.

Customer: [unintelligible]

Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- No business is coming from buyleads.

- Wants a refund for the subscription.

- Buyers are saying they already purchased AC.



Resolution:

- Executive stated customer used less buyleads.

- Explained that deals may take time to convert.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, usage
